title: Gray Area Incubator Artist Salon 2022.1
details:
6:00 - 6:30 pm: Event registration
6:30 - 8:00 pm: 10 Minute Talks
Open to the public sliding scale entry $0-$30
Free for Gray Area Members
All Ages, 21+ Bar
We're so excited to welcome you back to Gray Area for the first in-person Gray Area Incubator Artist Salon in over two years! Select members of our 2022.1 Incubator cohort will share their projects in development and we invite you to contribute your feedback. Incubator artists will present their work in a TED-style talk with a question and answer period from the audience. Gray Area Incubator Artists
Ari Kalinowski
Herson Guerrero Huh
Jacky Lu
Marc Kate
Michael Meisel
Liliya Kvatsabaya
Ryan Smith
Stephanie Andrews
Stephen Standridge
Steven Piasecki
Yasmin Mawaz-Khan Please note that we are currently accepting applications for our 2022.2 Incubator. Learn more and apply here.
Learn more about our Incubator members here.
